abstract: Lucas Ramón Barrios Cáceres (born 13 November 1984 in San Fernando, Buenos Aires) is a Argentine-Paraguayan footballer. He currently plays as a striker for Spartak Moscow. Barrios is known for his effectiveness in the target area. This earned him his nickname La Pantera, which means The Panther.Even though he was born in Argentina, Barrios' mother is Paraguayan, which made him eligible to receive Paraguay nationality at birth. He received his Paraguay nationality in March 2010.
